LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Hauler.label: Hauler(T1) Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Hauler.descripti: This station comes equipped with a specialized robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cleaner.label: Cleaner(T1) Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cleaner.descript: This station comes equipped with a specialized robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler.label: Hauler Bot
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler.description: A Tier 1 unit capable of hauling. This high-speed bot will so cremate corpses and apparel.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner.label: Cleaner Bot
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner.description: A Tier 1 unit capable of cleaning. This low-speed bot can also flick switches.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler.label: Hauler Bot (Tier 1)
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner.label: Cleaner Bot (Tier 1)
